metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Uncle Ruckus Theme is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Uncle Ruckus Theme is written in the key of A♯ Locrian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 11st most popular key among Locrian keys and     the 83rd most popular  among all keys. The A♯ Locrian scale is similar to the A♯ Minor scale except that both the 2nd and the 5th notes (B and E) are a half step lower.  This means that the characteristic "home base" chord of A♯ Locrian has a dissonant diminished quality (a#˚), which makes it a very uncommon choice for songs.

See the A♯ Locrian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
